full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN LHA MO'I SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(ZHES PA DE NI CHE BA JANG JONG WANG GI DGE BSKOS TZAS SANG NANG SO CHOS 'PHEL ZHES BYA BA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA'I BZLOG BSGYUR SHIN TU BSDUS PA'I PHYIR, ,DE LAS RGYAS PA ZHIG BGYIS ZHES @011B BSKUL BA LA DO MA LDOG PAR, DZA YA PANdE TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA'I THA SHAL PA BYUNG RGYAL DU SONG BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS BGYIS PA'I NYER TSOGS KUN LHA MO 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA 'BYAMS SHING BZOD PAR GSOL, 'OD KYIS GANG BGYIS PA KUN LA PHAN PA BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE LEGS 'PHEL BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
